website_summaries.verdict: A colorful fall-winter boot, but not warm enough for use during outdoor winter activities.
pros: Available in a variety of colors
cons: Not suitable for long periods of time out in the cold

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Christmas, not even a week later the seam has come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Zmom214

customer_reviews.title: Great for my  Alaska trip!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boats for a trip to Alaska. I wore them on rainy days walking around, but also on a fishing boat that unfortunately ended up being very rainy! My feet were warm and dry all day. I wore a pair of wool socks and rain gear (a must if fishing on the seas!) I also add my own inserts because of my high arches. I am a 7.5 shoe size and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Love. Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love. Comfortable and cute. I wear an 8 or 8.5...ordered an 8 and they fit just right. With thick socks they might be a bit snug though. Go great with your rooster apron too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing! That being said
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! That being said, it is important to note that they are intended for rain and not for extremely cold snowy conditions. Your feet will not be kept warm if you wear these in weather below freezing. In the Spring or Fall I can run through a puddle up to my ankle in these and not even know it. They are easy to style as well which makes them perfect for daily wear if you need it. I've had my pair for two years now and they are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S

customer_reviews.title: Fake boots
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. I got on the sperry website and ordered the same boot and compared the leather, tags, tread, etc. and immediately sent these back. Get the same boot from sperry for the same price and free shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Rich.and.Angie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money. I was wary of buying them online especially because I tend to have issues finding shoes that fit right. These ran just a tad big which was perfect. They’re great for rain and snow and are very comfortable. Only drawback is that the rubber makes my feet sweat. They also feature removable insoles so you can put custom/your own in if needed. Overall definitely recommend! Walked all across Rome in them, 45+ miles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the olive and brown, but unfortunately they are not waterproof. I had to walk through a big puddle today and water got in through the seam where the bottom meets the upper area. The water got into my boots and made my socks wet. I tried to include photos but it's hard to show the damp inner area or my wet spots on my socks. I'm bummed that these didn't work out. For the price I thought I was buying a quality product! I will be returning these!
customer_reviews.author: hnev

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe purchase ive made in a long time! They're so comfortable and so cute! I think they're betting fitting than the L.L. Bean boots and definitely more support. I was worried the leather would be too dark but it actually lightens up a bit as you wear them. I get more compliments on these boots than ANYTHING else I own!
customer_reviews.author: jtaylor

customer_reviews.title: Non-waterproof rain boots
customer_reviews.text: These are indeed cute boots. However, as "rain boots," they totally fail. Accidentally stepped into a puddle that was very shallow and instantly regretted my purchase. Even standing on wet grass, water has seeped in, damping my socks. The bottom of the boots, I've found, also don't have the best traction when slightly wet. Walked into a store with glossy tile from the rain and the boots were sliding a boot as I walked. I didn't need another pair of regular boots but need waterproof rain boots, but now I'm stuck with these and still searching for a pair of cute rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: volcomized

customer_reviews.title: Boots are comfortable and warm however after My 19 year old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots are comfortable and warm however after My 19 year old daughter wore these 1 time the black material around the lace area started coming off and showing white!!! Too much money to pay for poor quality!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for rain/snow!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted boots that doubled as rain/snow shoes and these are fabulous for that. On trend and good, sturdy quality. I didn’t like the loose ties look, it didn’t help keep the heat trapped in either, so I tied a knot with the end of the string where the top holes are so that they couldn’t feed through and loosen. Did the trick! Made them much slimmer looking and kept heat in. Zipper on the inside let’s you still slip your foot in and out even though they’re more snug
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Bought new but I feel like they were used.
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots. But I spent $130 on them and they were obviously sent to me from TJ Maxx or Marshalls. They have marker on the bottom that says "060" and a size sticker inside. I use to work at TJ Maxx and those were the stickers we used and we always marked the bottom with the price because people ripepd tags off. So I'm really annoyed these were passed around from store to store and sold to me at twice the price. That being said. They are very comfortable. And definitely good quality. But I feel like I bought a pair of used boots. :(. And feel totally ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Monroe

customer_reviews.title: I JUST received these & I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I JUST received these & I love them!! I wasn't sure about sizing when I ordered. I normally wear an 8.5-9 so I went with the 9. An 8.5 would have been too perfect of a fit. The size 9 allows for the option to tuck jeans in easier and wear thicker socks. The leather is not crappy fake leather and the inside is lined & warm. If you're trying to choose between these & another cheaper pair, definitely spend the extra money on these. You will love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bean Boots, I think.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing. Went from Sportos to these and was looking to spend/invest a bit more in my next round of duck boots. I wear them through NYC winters, and they're so comfortable. They fit true-to-size and are so stylish. I like that they're low, and I especially love the little zipper on the inside because they're easy to get on and off. I left the laces as they came, since they're perfectly tied. I really recommend these for someone who doesn't feel like joining the Bean Boot clan, because I've tried those on before, and I personally feel these are better (both in price and appearance).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think these are authentic...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase these at a great price but I believe that they are not authentic. The soles are completely different compared to my Sperrys duck boots from a major department store. Also, the labeling is completely different inside the tongue of the shoe, the fit is off and the material feels different. Disappointed so back they go!
customer_reviews.author: LottieK

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off? Batch of rejects?
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken a picture to show the differences. I bought a pair from Amazon and another exact pair from Sperry's website. The Amazon one had a different type of tag on the tongue and the embossed logo was really faded. It looked like maybe it had been sitting in the sun for a long time. Otherwise there wasn't really much of a difference, but I didn't want to risk it being a knock-off or reject so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Misslibbis

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected. Looks better in person. I bought a 1/2 size up knowing that I will be layering my sock game and really glad I did because it is true to size. I was also a bit worried that the rubber part would be extra shiny but it’s not. Very comfortable shoes. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christabel

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes and they fit great; however, I had to send back the first pair that I ordered. Originally after reading the reviews, I ordered a 9- which is true to size for me. They had to have been mislabeled and really a 10 or so because they were huge. I reordered at a size 8.5 and they fit perfect. I measured the difference between the two shoes because I hadn't sent the first pair back yet, and they were 1.5 inches in difference. I'm happy with the second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet dry & warm!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to wander the rainy, damp Pacific Northwest! Comfortable & roomy enough for thick socks. Kept my feet dry & warm. Has a side zipper I wasn't expecting, but helps with getting them on & off. The laces are short with weird knots on the ends. I just knotted them, not enough lace to tie a bow. Well made & I expect them to last.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Obviously fake
customer_reviews.text: These are obviously fake. I have a pair in black and they slip on easily and about half a size too big. I saw these at Dillards a few months ago and should have bought them then but I was traveling and didn't want to pack them. The ones I received are not even close to the comfort or appearance. I can't even get these on! I cant get my foot past the awkward angle at the ankle no matter how much I loosen the ties. This is really becoming a trend and I am tired of returning stuff....Do yourself a favor, buy them from a reputable site like the Sperry website.
customer_reviews.author: k8tydid

customer_reviews.title: Is this really a Sperry product or a knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is a genuine Sperry product. It looks like a knock off, cheaply made. If it is their product, it looks like a seconds piece. Zipper doesn’t work all that great, hard to get up and down. The fabric isn’t sewn together in a seamless fashion, pieces of white backing are sticking out where the fabric is sewn together. Too bad because the boot is cute and comfortable. I never wore them sent them back so I can’t comment as to whether or not they are truly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Could not get them on over my foot.  These are NOT slip on.
customer_reviews.text: Even with the zipper down, I could not get these over my foot. I have a very narrow foot and am a true 81/2 size. I ordered my size and could not get them over my foot. With the stylish dangly laces, the laces do not loosen to assist in getting these over the foot. It’s a shame. I would not go a half size up just to get them on, because then the actual foot form would be too big. I will look for Velcro or lower cut versions. If you have big feet or large ankles, AVOID THESE.
customer_reviews.author: cwink1

customer_reviews.title: Can't rate because I couldn't get it on my foot!
customer_reviews.text: I'm between 9.5 and 10, ordered a 9.5 in this boot. Because it zips rather than ties, I unzipped to try it on. Could not fit my foot into the boot. If there had been a loop on the heel, I may have been able to. However, there's no loop. I returned and ordered in a size 10. Hopefully that will help, because I believe Sperry is a great brand and this boot gets great reviews here.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy, perfect for winter.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They’re so warm and fit pretty much true to size in length. They’re a roomy if you don’t pull the laces tight but that allows room for warm socks. The price was great and I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. Like others I did find it strange that they came in a plain brown box with no labels or writing and the tag inside seemed generic but this was my first pair of Sperry’s so I have nothing to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rodz

customer_reviews.title: Really weird sizing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This review is about the sizing. This has been a rather disappointing experience. I was really looking forward to getting these boots. I typically wear a 10 for boots, ordered that and it was too large, even with socks. Ordered a 9 and those were too snug, even without socks. 9.5 again was too snug. Really weird sizing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boot
customer_reviews.text: Have to go down a size. Sperry duck boots run big. Usually wear a 7 but fits better in 6. Also, the only reason I gave a 1 star is because it took 2 purchases, the 1st order has marks on the boots. 2nd order it looked like someone tried them on due to no inserts in boots for shaping and either white dog / cat hair was inside both boots. Not happy with that. But overall I was refunded so at least I got refunded for all the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Feels comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tested the Rain boots with thick wool socks. They feel fine. I have very wide feet. I admit that they are difficult for me to get on but once my feet are in, they are super comfortable. I'm excited to have this kind of foot protection for our Alaskan Cruise. Yippee! I'm so hard to fit! I'm a woman's size 8 WIDE. I struggle getting them on but everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hummerlady

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet or high arches
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. They are exactly what i needed BUT I couldnt even get them on. I have wide fore foot and high arches. The zipper doesnt go down far enough for me to even get my foot into the boot. I wear an 8 and ordered an 8.5 just to be safe. It was still a no go. I would probably have to have a 9.5 to wear these with thick socks. So sad. They are REALLY cute and well made but my short wide feet and high arches wont go into this zippered style boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Savoie-Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth about whether or not I wanted to spend so much on a pair of boots but I am so glad I did. Worth every penny. I own a shop and wear these everyday and they are holding up nicely. They look great and I get compliments all the time. Am going to order another pair in the grey. Also I bought my regular size 8 and they fit perfect even with thicker socks on.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth givens

customer_reviews.title: After 4 orders... all Fake and Dirty!
customer_reviews.text: After 4 tries... The quality on these are terrible! The inside lining does not reach the bottom of the shoe, leaving a huge flap and 1in gap between sole and flap, the shoe tag is poorly heat transferred, and the insole itself is a thin knock off. Not to mention, they arrived worn and dirty! :( They have all being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great Mucky Boot
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful boots for wet seasons! Pretty and Practical - They are cute enough to wear out (unlike my big muck boots) and they seem pretty appropriate for most wet outdoor activities! Wore them out hiking, (wet Minnesota Spring) and the water only really tried to go over the rubber part in two places, although I didn't dilly-dally in the water, my feet did stay dry. Ultimately, these will be my go to water boots from here on out, and I'll be reserving/retiring the Muck boots for extremely wet/wading activities from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Deitz

customer_reviews.title: Not new!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. Stylish and warm. I was surprised that these were sold as new boots. The soles were obviously worn as they had discoloration in them. No typical packaging in the inside of the boot. A few scratches on the boot part. I decided for the hassle I won’t return them I have bought MANY shoes on amazon including speerys. Disappointed needed to be sold as used.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They came quick and clean, they also fit like a glove! I read through the reviews to order down. I’m typically a 7.5-8 so I ordered a 7.5 and they fit like a glove, with space for a pair of comfy socks.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn May

customer_reviews.title: Boots are HUGE.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got me these for Christmas and I absolutely love the boot. However, they are huge! I ordered my size, 7.5, because they were labeled true to size. I’m not sure if I got a pair that was incorrectly labeled, but I’m very frustrated that I have to wear 2 pairs of socks with these. I wore them Christmas Day with big fuzzy socks, so I didn’t realize how big they were I til I put them on the next day with normal socks. If I’d realized this, I would have returned them. Mine must be at least an 8.5 or bigger. Very frustrating considering how much they cost.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Got these because my mom has a pair that she loves. They are much more lightweight than other similar boots (thinking particularly of LL Bean which are quite heavy) and the zipper is nice for easily slipping them on. I wouldn't think of wearing duck boots while walking around town, but I wore them travelling yesterday and they were great. I am a true 8 in shoe size and these are a little roomy, which I like. Room for a boot insert for more arch support or thicker socks, or just as is with the laces tied tighter. These are a good value and I'm glad to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, really like the boot...the sole/tread - meah.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in mid December of 2018. Fit well, look great (just like the boots I had in the 80’s), easy to put on and take off. I wore them though the winter (West Michigan) We had our first snow/ice of the season today so I wore them to work. Took them off when I came home and noticed how much tread had worn off. Very disappointing...for $99 I would have thought the tread would have lasted longer. That’s the reason for only 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they're real
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews on Amazon, but I think this one is necessary. There's been a lot of back and forth on whether or not these boots are "real" Sperry's. My sister already owned these boots, and she purchased them directly from sperry about 2 years ago. I got the exact same boots, but I bought them on Amazon to save money. I've attached pictures of them side by side, and they're exactly the same! So yes, they're real. I'm super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tess Hebert

customer_reviews.title: So cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I live in Pennsylvania where yucky rain and slushy snow is the norm, so I will get a lot of use out of these. These boots are very cute on, and so far waterproof and comfortable. Does not dig in anywhere. My only complaint is that the zipper is just for looks and does not loosen the tightest part of the opening so I have to jam my foot through, but once it’s in it fits great. The fleece lining is thin but seems perfectly fine for everyday running errands etc. on a cold day. I got dark olive size 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: SamSquanch

customer_reviews.title: A Comfortable Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots were so very comfortable, I was so surprised. I've had trouble throughout my life getting comfortable footwear. Was so happy, and surprised to find this boot fit me and are as comfortable as my house slippers. Would have purchased years ago, had I known, since I really like the style. I wear size 9, but ordered 9.5 and they were perfect with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, they are super cute. I’m in between sizes , depending on the shoe and the name brand. I usually wear a 9 1/2 - 10. I went with the 9-1/2 and they fit great. Someone said they are navy blue, but Up against my gray & black Sperry’s.. you can’t tell they are navy blue. I attached pictures of the two.
customer_reviews.author: Candice S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL SPERRYS
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Sperry’s from 2 years ago and when I received this pair I noticed they were different so I contacted Sperry to ask if they sold authentic boots to amazon and they said yes. After talking with someone and submitting pictures they informed me that these boots are fake. They are not authentic Sperry boots! The left boot in the pictures are the real sperry boots. Save your money and don’t buy these
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Just love these stylish boots!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a country girl with style. I live on a horse farm and own barn boots, but when I saw these I thought, what great boots to wear out and about--to the kids soccer games, to horseshows where I'm spectating rather than showing, and yes, to a casual dinner spot. Well, they met my expectations to the Tee! They fit great. They're comfortable--wore them to this morning's soccer game. And they look great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE BOOTS!!! They are very comfortable and the leather looks and feels so rugged and lush!!! With all the rain lately, I was sick of my rain boots and really needed a change. These boots were the perfect escape and they still kept my feet dry. Besides rainy days, they are great for early morning soccer games that require me to trudge across a wet field. Through rainy streets and uneven grass/dirt/mud, these boots were comfortable after hours and hours of wearing them. They also look great with leggings and jeans. I highly recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: yxa2173

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots. I had a pair of six year old Sperry waterproof boots, and they just finally needed replacement. The only reason I gave four stars is because the rawhide laces are almost useless. They’re too cute to switch out at this point but at some point I will use regular shoe laces to make it easier to get a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Clawson

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So first off I wear a size 8, I went 1/2 size up for those days that I may need a thick socks. I did NOT need to order a size up. The shoes is roomy, comfortable, did I say comfortable? Ohh I did. Super soft and cushiony on the inside, the color is prettier in person. This would also make an excellent holiday gift. I am sooo happy with my purchase now I see what the hype was all about. Don't think about it, get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.....
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase the shoe twice because the first shoe did not match the description of the product and was returned. Shoe on left was my first purchase, it came with grease stains on inside of shoe. The label on the tongue of the shoe did not match the pic online and seemed fake, it seemed very plain and engraving on the bottom did not look like authentic Sperry. My second pair of shoes I recieved the shoes on the right of the photo matched the product that was listed in the pics. They do run a little large also.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Roberts

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so incredibly comfortable!! I compared the pictures on Amazon with those on the Sperry site and they were identical - including the ones of the tongue tag. These have been my go to running errands shoes since I got them - rain or shine! They're easy to take on and off, go with everything, they're true to size (I wear a size 10 and order a schizoid 10 on these; perfect fit!) and the sole of the shoe is the most comfortable I've ever walked on!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected. I was very impressed with the versatility and wearability of these boots. I was going to Denver after the bomb cyclone and then on to California. These were great to wear around the city and kept my feet warm and dry. I even dressed them up for a conference I was attending. They weren’t made for hiking, but worked well in some rocky terrain. I especially liked these boots because the zipper is convenient for going through airport security. Honestly, I wish I had bought these shoes sooner and had been able to wear them this winter!
customer_reviews.author: RaeAnn Wintin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen the review about these being fake but I already own 2 pairs that I bought from Sperry directly. The pair I received seems to be the real deal and is identical to the ones I already own. It always has been my go to shoe for rainy & cold days! Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Wore them right out of the box to walk my doggies in the wet grass and they were VERY comfortable. I'm normally a size 8 1/2 but purchased a 9, in case I want to wear thicker socks. Fits great! Love the zipper on the side. Easy to put on and take off. Super cute too, even my husband likes them. Would definitely buy again.!!
customer_reviews.author: Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these duck boots! They’re super cute and fit perfectly. I wear a 7.5W and I often times have a hard time finding shoes that come in a wider set so I often go up a half size to compromise. So I was happy to see they carry my true size. I also love that I can wear these in rain or snow! I also had these in my cart for about a month before I purchased them. During that time I did watch the price fluctuate almost daily or every other day. I eventually ended up purchasing them $20 cheaper than when I originally put them in my cart! I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Kay Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot! Love Sperry!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Sperry products!!! Not sure about the other reviews I've seen here, but these are the real deal! I live in MN and these boots can handle the change in weather we experience regularly. These fit true to size and are more generous in the width (I wear boots socks and they still fit great), so I don't recommend ordering up in size.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and light. Easty to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I was between these and a Sorrell pair and these are WAY more comfy. The were wider in the toe box. The were also much lighter. The zipper on the side makes it easy to get them on and off. I got a nice grey sock that peeks out over the top and wear them with leggings in bad weather. I feel like this black color is way more mature and I dont look like college student compared to the navy and brown version
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear either a 9.5 or 10 so I ordered the 10 and it was absolutely perfect. The side zipper helps get them on and off and the nice leather laces finish off the tightening around the ankles. I was worried the rubber tread wouldn’t be knobby enough for trail terrain in Oregon but they performed great, kept my feet warm and dry, and looked great doing so! And thanks to Amazon I got them at a great price and two day shipping. Happy all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: T. Carr

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sperry boots!! This is my second pair - I got my first a few years in a different color and pretty much wore them every single day In Fall, Winter, and Spring. They’re so comfortable, stylish and keep my feet warm and dry in Ohio weather. When my last ones wore out I ordered these and they’re just as good. Great quality and durability. The soles do get wore down after a couple of years of wear, making them a little slick, but nothing lasts forever, right?
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite duck boots so far!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first Sperry brand duck boots. My cousin owns the same boots and recommended them. Honestly, I was pleasantly surprised at how comfy these were. I've owned other duck boot brands - I live in the Pacific NW where it rains often - and these are the most comfortable pair to date! I actually look forward to the rain now, so I have an excuse to wear these boots and not have to walk around puddles, but through them!
customer_reviews.author: MBHobsonTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Run large-- and a bit on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half a size down because I know Sperry runs larger, but with these I should have went a full size smaller. With thick socks I should be ok.. they are a bit on the heavy side and the calf of it is a little too loose for my taste, but again I am hoping thick socks will help that as well. I am finally getting to wear them today for the first time and with the right socks they are PERFECT!!! I will be ordering another pair in a different color soon :)
customer_reviews.author: Diana G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and fit of these boots. I normally wear size 9 in any closed shoes....only sometimes 8.5 in some sandals. However, I have 8.5 in another pair of Sperry Saltwater duck boots and those fit great. Plus, many reviews said they run big, so I went with an 8.5 in these and they're perfect. They didn't come in an original Sperry box, which I find weird, but they're in great condition, so I guess it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: cls

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fashionable boot that's true to size
customer_reviews.text: It's been raining a lot recently and I needed a comfortable boot to walk long distances in. This boot is perfect for my needs! The design is cute, and the construction is sturdy and comfortable. It is not too big on my feet like other rain boots, but there is still room for socks and tucked-in leggings/jeans, and the laces allow the tightness of the boot to be easily adjusted. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find them incredibly comfortable and very cute
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE fan of these Sperry's! I tried them first at DSW to make sure the sizing was right (they right half a size small). I work outside in a rainy climate and wear there almost every day. I find them incredibly comfortable and very cute! I would not recommend for very cold weather as the rubber is not very warm (or wear very thick/warm socks).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're super neutral, easy to slip on and off, & so cute! I ordered an 8 to wear with thick socks, & they're still a little bit big, but not uncomfortably big. ( I usually wear a 7-7.5) Update: worn in snow (no leaking, but they're not snow boots, so if you stay out too long you get cold feet) & some heavy rain (still no leaking!) They're holding up great after everyday use for several months!
customer_reviews.author: L C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walking the dogs
customer_reviews.text: Good rain boots. Came in a little scratched here and there, like someone had tried them on and decided to return. Not a big deal, since I bought them like $30 cheaper when compared to Sperry's website. Also I'm not a big fan of the leather part, prone to scratches and yet to be seen how well it will hold up in really rainy and muddy weather. Overall I'm happy, it will serve it's purpose, which is walking the dogs when it's nasty outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer's defect
customer_reviews.text: As beautiful as these are and functional there is a manufacturer's defect in the left shoe. There is a fold that has been molded into the soul that is causing a blister on my foot and I've literally only been wearing these for 2 hours. Would love to have a left shoe sent as this one is defective... Will be reaching out to the seller and hopefully to remedy this I can edit the review accordingly depending on the service
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are soooo comfortable and for me to say that with my super sensitive feet is great!!!!!I Normally wear a 10 and originally ordered a 9 1/2 and those were way big. Sent them back and ordered a 9 and they fit perfect! So just order 1 whole size smaller and you'll be fine! I may order another pair in a different color since it is so very hard for me to find any shoes or boots that are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cute boot and they keep your feet dry!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking in the rain! Wore these on excursions in Alaska where we were in rainy conditions and even some running water. My feet stayed dry and comfortable. I wore these with wool socks, so I stayed warm, too. I did quite a bit of walking, and a couple of longer jaunts ( a couple of miles) and they were comfortable the whole way.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and warm yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time looking for a good waterproof shoe that can handle hiking in the woods and also walks on pavement. This shoe is lightweight, soft and comfy. It has a zipper on the inside, however the laces are leather and you can't tie them to make them tighter on your foot. Guess you can remove the laces and replace with regular ones. Not a big deal. I normally wear size 9 but with these a size 8.5 fits with an insole and a sock.
customer_reviews.author: NCoz

customer_reviews.title: Slippery soles.
customer_reviews.text: For rain boots they are slippery!! I have to be very careful when walking on wet surfaces. Very disappointed for the price. I bought a different brand with a better sole that are much better. They are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Chantell Oliver

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like them so much but just couldn't
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't give these 1 star because they are so cute in person....but where the quilted fabric is stitched to meet the rubber sole was SO uncomfortable. It rubbed the side and back of my ankle immediately, was WAY too tight and I knew after taking a few steps that I had to return them. I wanted to like them so much but just couldn't. Opted for a similar style in the kids (ordered 6 Big Kid), they fit perfectly, were very well made and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken N

customer_reviews.title: Look sharp and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Needed something that wouldn’t slip when it rained. I replaced an old pair of “duck boots” with a cute and trendy pair. First time it rained and I wore them, almost went down for the count! These were exactly what I was looking for. Very comfortable and don’t slip when it’s wet outside. Great transition boot from winter to spring and fall to winter. They look sharp too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mme

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOES EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a pair of these wonderful boots for a decent price for a long while. The boots arrived when expected (within 2 days) and they are keeping my feet from getting wet. They are warm. I think I ordered them too big because my foot slides so do not be afraid to go a half size down from your regular shoe size. I definitely want another color for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Crys C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and very warm.
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 9.5 and ordered as such. Great sturdy boots, quality materials and a decent price for a name brand boot. Very happy with them and look forward to wearing them next season and probably many seasons to come.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hogue

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I got a size 8 and fits perfectly. I just wore my normal boot socks and they look great with jeans and leggings. Super comfortable, wore them out all night and my feet were not sore. Haven’t worn them in the rain or snow yet, but it was cold and my feet stayed warm. The zippers were stuck at first but I used a Q-tip and olive oil and they work perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patti M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable and Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southern California and bought these boots for rainy days. Regarding size: I usually wear an 8 or 8.5 in regular width. I bought these in size 8 and they fit perfectly. The boots look better in person. I love the fit, color and rugged yet not bulky look. I walked through deep puddles and the boots kept my feet dry. Wish it would rain more so I can wear these more often!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mendelson

customer_reviews.title: Not really for work but cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work based on a recommendation from a co-worker. I think they're more for style rather than function. Yes they did keep my feet dry all day BUT they have very little support on the balls of your feet but plenty in the heels. I was also shocked they aren't slip resistant either. I was going to give 3 stars but no lie they're very stylish for boots that actually keep your feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: james rasor

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Do you know how hard it is to find a product this good in a half size. TRY then buy this one. We went camping and low and behold it rained 97 percent of the time. Hubby had wet feet I had dry feet cant say the same about the rest of me running in and out of cover to do things . Love these boots. Thinking about buying another pair before they change them, in fact going to do that right now. Tootles, Dog Mom, with dry warm feet.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a short stylish winter rain boot. It was a tough decision between Hunter and Xtratuff. I’m really glad I went with Sperry, this is actually my first time buying any of their shoes. Definitely lives up to the brand’s quality. The lining is super soft, the fit and soles are comfy, and its great to have a winter boot that can work for many occasions! You can’t go wrong with buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Best Camping Shoes I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size bigger than what I normally get. I wear an 8 normally and ordered an 8.5. Someone told me they fit a little narrow and to order up and she was right. If I had ordered an 8 they would have been too tight. A half size up fits perfect. I wore them camping this weekend. We had frost, rain, dew, sun, mud, etc. They were perfect. They're cute and not to heavy or get too hot when the weather is warmer. They feel like good quality shoes. I will suggest buying crew socks to wear with them though. I don't like them rubbing my ankle so crews were a must.
customer_reviews.author: Haylie

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot. I'm so glad I purchased these. I had been looking at some other brands and people said this was the best. Very glad I listened and did my research. I have a medium size foot. I ordered the size 9 and it fit as expected. They are lined with warm fuzzy material and comfortable to walk in. They are water proof and all around a very good boot.
customer_reviews.author: G. Denton

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with high arches
customer_reviews.text: The instep of the boot is too short. I started with a size 7, then tried a size 8 hoping that would solve the problem. If you have a high instep, this boot is a tight fit. The boot itself is great. I wish it would have worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size too large
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely beautiful, but they do run a half size too big. I'm a size 9 and had a lot of wiggle room in the toes. I will be returning them and ordering an 8.5. If you order a pair, just size down a 1/2 size. Update - I returned the boots and ordered the 8.5 and they’re still too big. I will be returning these boots and sticking with my G. H. Bass duck boots.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn Van-wearing teen even loves these boots.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage daughter because she would rather walk to the bus stop wearing Vans in the rain or with 4 inches of snow on the ground, than wear boots... until these. These boots keep her feet warm and dry in wet weather and look cute with jeans on sunny winter days. The boots are well made and roomy enough for thick socks. The sturdy construction makes me believe they’ll stand up to senior year and four years of college in the northeast.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Joy

customer_reviews.title: THIS ARE A KNOCKOFF, DONT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DEFINATELY NOT THE REAL SPERRY DUCK SHOES! 😡 NOT THE REAL DEAL! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS! THIS ARE A KNOCKOFF!! MADE IN CHINA AND WITH LOTS OF ERRORS, I'M SURE THE SOLE IS GOING TO FALL APART VERY SOON!
customer_reviews.author: Zai

customer_reviews.title: I love that the tops are wide enough that it's super ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these boots for quite some time. They fit a little bigger, I would've sized down but I hope when I where bigger thinker socks it will make them a little more snug. I love that the tops are wide enough that it's super cute even though I have bigger more muscular legs. UPDATE: I have had these boots just a couple weeks and the stitching on the boot is already coming apart. I am so disappointed and frustrated. Update 2: Customer Service contacted me and fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dittman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived worn and used looking
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive these boots as we have 10 days straight of rain in our forecast. I have tried them on previously in another color and they fit well. I was incredibly disappointed and annoyed to open the box and find they looked used! The inside of the boot has some pilling. The blue shiny part of the boots are greasy and covered in finger prints. The bottoms of the boots have dirt and looked walked on. Honestly they are good condition for purchasing used boots. But these were listed as new and I paid the price for new and they should have been new when they arrived. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't even get my foot in the boot!
customer_reviews.text: The boot looks great! Unfortunately, the opening was so small I couldn't get my foot in the boot. DIsappointed and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bijouxbb

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5, I ordered a size 8, because of the way the tongue is sold, I cannot get my foot into the shoe without a struggle. It’s very difficult to pull the boot on. The material of the boot is very flimsy for a boot. You can actually fold the boot.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Update after a year: Upgrading to 5 stars from 4 stars. These boots have held up on countless hiking trails. Still very comfortable. Easy to clean off dirt. Glad I bought them!! Really cute. Perfect rain boots, but I wear them when it's not raining too. My only complaint is that they don't stay tied very well. The shoelaces aren't long enough to properly tie the shoes, so you have to just twist the laces together by the knobby ends.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Felt very cheap! Appeared to be used as the bottoms were dirty. I do not believe these we genuine Sperry shoes. I returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned rain boots in my life. I grew up in the desert, lived in Southern California the rest of the time and have been on the east coast for 9 years. I kept looking for rain boots but I didn't find anything I liked. These boots work well in the rain and the snow. I have walked on icy sidewalks with them too. They are easy to put on with the side zippers too. They look cute with jeans or leggings. I am so glad that I finally decided to get a pair. They seem well made and fit well with wool hand knit socks or commercial socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Pester

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots for winter. Warm, sturdy bottoms for slippery walks, and really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Popplewell

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and seem true to size. I sized up a half size based on reviews, but I wish I hadn't. I'm trying to wear them around the house with insoles and thick socks to see if it helps them fit more snugly. If that doesn't work, I'll be returning them. Also, they squeak a bit on my floors due to the grippy type sole, it's not overly loud, but it is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: Love these water boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an Amazon Certified Used item. Look brand new. Definitely never worn. Might be a return item but I paid 1/3 of retail price. Would buy Amazon Certified Used again. Shoe is exactly as described and exceeded my expectations. Glad I was able to get this shoe in Wide.
customer_reviews.author: SDD610

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BE WARE!
customer_reviews.text: I’m more than sure these are not authentic Sperrys. As soon as I took them out of the box I knew something wasn’t right. Besides the tear in the seam of the boot these are VERY cheaply made. Sent back in the same 24 hours for a refund, and ordered real sperrys from their website for the same price these knockoffs were sold for.
customer_reviews.author: Crystina M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, functional. I love these boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I only bought them for a winter break trip I took up north in February, but I still continued to wear them when I returned home to Louisiana. They are very comfortable and make perfect rain boots. I can't wait to bring them out again when the summer is behind us.
customer_reviews.author: JessiC

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these out for three year ish, the outside heal part where I dragg my foot slightly on one foot.. has a tiny ware and tare (hole) no water has seeped in. Besides that.... The shoes kept its' sheen and shape so far! They are waterproof. Not hot inside, so you could wear them in the spring/ summer during rainy days with shorts on!
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Muffins

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These run large I can wear a 7.5 or 8. I got an 8 so they would be too small I can slip my foot in and they are very comfy and waterproof I tested them they dry quick if the inside gets wet from rain super stylish and very nice I bought 2 pairs different colors I will get a lot of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to keep my feet dry and warm in the wet, slushy, snowy weather. These are perfect! They transition to different temps without me being aware. I can be outside and be plenty warm, but go into the mall for a few hours and forget they are on. These are also well made, so I anticipate they will last for years. I am very happy with this purchase, and are my teenage daughters that keep stealing them! 😂
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB6

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap knockoff
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes after borrowing my sister’s last month. I bought the same shoes in the same size for the same price and ended up with shoes that are completely different. The fit is different, the laces feel cheaper, there are spots that are already falling apart and peeling off. I’ll be returning them and am very disappointed in this transaction. If I wanted a $100 knockoff I would have bought a Rolex.
customer_reviews.author: leah curren

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I bought them for a trip to Iceland. I wanted lightweight books that would be easy to wear and walk around in all day, yet still keep my feet warm and dry. These are it! I now use them as rain boots as well now that we’re back home. Fit as expected. So comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hurchick

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, but don't last
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots, but I wore them out pretty quickly. After 1 year, the sole starting tearing off. Better to pay the same price for the actual L.L. Bean boots and have a lifetime warranty. They are comfy, just wish they would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sperry Women's Saltwater Shiny Quilted Rain Boot
feature_bullets: Rawhide barrel lacing with rustproof eyelets for secure fit
Non-marking lugged rubber outsole with Wave-Siping for ultimate wet/dry traction
